full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 451 Filed 11/12/21 Page 5 of 5

Non-parties such as Inner City Press and myself have standing to intervene in criminal proceedings to assert the public's right of access. United States v. Aref, 533 F.3d 72, 81 (2d Cir. 2008).

Please confirm receipt and docket this timely responsive filing (see eg in this case, Dkt 363), making Inner City Press an Interested Party (as was done in Dkt 362), and thank you for your attention to it as you make logistical arrangements for the trial.

Respectfully submitted,
Matthew Russell Lee, Inner City Press

cc: Alison Moe, Maurene Comey at DOJ; Counsel Sternheim and Everdell

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing with a clear and legible text. There are no visible redactions or damage.
